style: High-key studio portrait direct flash aesthetic East Asian social media style Ulzzang Douyin stylized beauty retouching

body.pose: seated legs crossed and tucked close to body
body.gesture: Right hand raised fingers loosely curled back of fingers/knuckles gently supporting the chin and lower cheek

face.makeup: Stylized K-Beauty/Douyin look: flawless matte base strong pink blush high on cheeks pink gradient lips defined brows light eyeliner emphasized Aegyo-sal
face.features: small beauty mark/mole under the left eye

hair.style: messy high updo/bun with loose strands and curtain bangs

wardrobe.outerwear: light gray zip hoodie worn open and slightly slipping off both shoulders

environment.set: black leather sofa against a plain white or light gray wall
environment.props: Silver laptop Apple MacBook logo visible placed on the cushion

key.modifier: Bare reflector or direct flash hard source
key.effect: Crisp dark well-defined cast shadows on the wall strong specular highlights on skin

postprocess.texture: Highly smoothed skin poreless appearance porcelain doll or beauty filter effect
